item.title: Would you stop using OpenAI’s ChatGPT and API if Elon Musk took it over?
item.description: It's hardly out-of-the-question that Musk could succeed. After all, his bid to takeover Twitter was also deemed a longshot.

item.title: Who’s using AI the most? The Anthropic Economic Index breaks down the data
item.description: Anthropic uncovers AI's true workforce impact: 57% augmentation vs 43% automation across industries, based on 4 million Claude interactions.

item.title: Decoding OpenAI’s Super Bowl ad and Sam Altman’s grandiose blog post
item.description: Critics of OpenAI would say it's more empty hype designed to continue placating OpenAI's big-pocketed investors. But I'm not so sure.

item.title: Sharge’s Loomos AI smart glasses hits $1.5M in 5 days on Kickstarter
item.description: Sharge, a wireless charging supplier, has raised $1.53 million for the Kickstarter launch of its Loomos AI Glasses in just a five days.

item.title: Inside Monday’s AI pivot: Building digital workforces through modular AI
item.description: AI adoption is not a one and done, it’s a journey that enterprises and software vendors alike are on, from assistants to agentic AI.
